catalogue_raissonne: Hind 195 i/ii; B.356; Mz.95 ii/ii; Holl. 356 i/ii; B-B. 42-3 i/ii
creditline:
The William M. Ladd Collection
Gift of Herschel V. Jones, 1916
text: Rembrandt captured a delightful moment of observation and delivered it with all the freshness of the girl's market purchases. The rapid, yet perfectly calibrated zigzag down the bodice exemplifies his exquisite freedom of hand.
title: Girl with a Basket
